_sText:
Dowload the map and save it into C:\program files\steam\steamapps\"USERNAME"\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

 This is a fixed version of bhop_sync.

This is a short but hard bhop map with multi-bhop platforms. There are no shortcuts or secret places throughout the bhop parts. There are no bugs on this map. Good luck and have fun with it!

Changes:

-fog reduced

-there are more stages for unexperienced bhoppers

-the final teleports has been fixed

-there are checkpoints on the climbing part

-the very dark skyboxe was changed to a ligher one

-more spawnpoints has been added
